::Spears::

She knealt down and crawled under a console panel.  She touched the 
panel and it crumbled away into ash and small metal bits.  She sighed 
deeply. "This isn't my idea of an easy job.  I'd like to repay the 
Preds for all this. One way or another."  
She opened her link. "Hey, Striker could you come to the computer 
room for a moment.  I may need you  AHHH!."  Part of the panel 
housing collapsed and covered her with ash, soot, and bits of 
computer parts, wires and metal bits. She was covered and had black 
ash and soot all over her face and upper body.  She frowned and 
slowly crawled out from the console.  She stood up and tried wiping 
the soot off.  But it only smeared around, and make her look dirtier 
and messier.  Her eyes stood out in all the black on her face.  She 
looked at herself and sighed. This wasn't her day, she thought.
